org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.distmap

Class DownloadDistmapResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.broadinstitute.hellbender.cmdline.CommandLineProgram
      • org.magicdgs.readtools.engine.ReadToolsProgram
        • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.distmap.DownloadDistmapResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginProvider

    @DocumentedFeature
public final class DownloadDistmapResult
extends ReadToolsProgram
    Download, sort and merge the alignments generated by DistMap (Pandey & Schl√∂tterer 2013).

    This tool scan the folder provided as input for multi-part BAM/SAM/CRAM files (e.g. 'part-*'), sort and merge them by batches (in the temp directory) and finally merge all the barches into a single output file.

    ReadTools.note:
    The resulsts are expected to be located in the Hadoop FileSystem (HDFS) and the output file in the local computer for following usage, but it is not required.
